cells.data:
-- foldr1 :: (a -> a -> a) -> [a] -> a
on foldr1(f, xs)
    if length of xs > 1 then
        tell mReturn(f)
            set v to item -1 of xs
            set lng to length of xs
            repeat with i from lng - 1 to 1 by -1
                set v to |Î»|(item i of xs, v, i, xs)
            end repeat
            return v
        end tell
    else
        xs
    end if
end foldr1
